description: This file defines a FastAPI web service for hotel and menu management. It includes data models using Pydantic, in-memory datasets for hotels and menus, and API endpoints for searching and retrieving hotel details and menus. It also configures CORS middleware and API metadata.

classes.name: GeoPoint
classes.description: Geographic coordinate for latitude and longitude.

classes.name: Hotel
classes.description: Hotel/restaurant entity as per OpenAPI schema.

classes.name: MenuOption
classes.description: Configuration option for a menu item (e.g., size, toppings).

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: Menu item as per OpenAPI schema.

methods.name: search_hotels
methods.description: API endpoint to search for hotels based on filters such as query, location, cuisine, rating, and sorting criteria.

methods.name: get_hotel
methods.description: API endpoint to retrieve detailed information about a specific hotel by ID.

methods.name: get_hotel_menu
methods.description: API endpoint to retrieve menu items for a specific hotel by ID.

methods.name: root
methods.description: Health check endpoint indicating service status.
